issue.title: Model for left arm is wrong in v4 (and has always been wrong)

content.raw: Sorry about the shy joint names. I thought I was being smart by applying our joint name mapping, running our modification script, and then applying the inverse of the joint name mapping, but it turns out our joint name mapping was out of date. The shy's should be renamed back to shz.
content.html: Sorry about the shy joint names. I thought I was being smart by applying our joint name mapping, running our modification script, and then applying the inverse of the joint name mapping, but it turns out our joint name mapping was out of date. The shy's should be renamed back to shz.
